name: Remedy: Avoid Workflows with Subqueries
description: SQL Artifacts should not use SQL statement including Subqueries (at least subqueries should be avoided).
output: This report lists all Workflows with SQL statement including Subqueries. It provides the following information: Workflow full name
rationale: Having complex queries in SQL Artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries with Subqueries are considered complex.
remediation: Review the design of the query to avoid if possible Subqueries

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
